data.title: Dr. Mohammad Riazuddin Molla Dhaka University Profile
data.meta_description: University of Dhaka - the highest echelon of academic excellence
data.text:
Journal Article 1

Mohammad Riazuddin Molla, GM Bhuiyan and AZ Ziauddin Ahmed : An Orbital Free Ab-initio Molecular Dynamics Study of Liquid Pt for Static and Dynamic Properties, Dhaka University Journal of Science , vol.69(3) , no.Centennial Special Issue 2022 , pp.179-185 , 2022 .

2

M. R. Molla, A. Z. Ziauddin Ahmed and G. M. Bhuiyan : Static and Dynamic properties of Elemental Liquid Pd: An Orbital Free Molecular Dynamic Study, Journal of Nepal Physical Society , vol.6(1) , pp.59-67 , 2020 .

3

M. R. Molla, A. Z. Z. Ahmed, M. Alamgir Hossain, G. M. Bhuiyan and M. M. Rahma : Static and dynamic properties of liuid Fe: An OF-AIMD simulation study, Physica B: Condensed Matter (impact factor:2.988) , vol.567 , pp.129-137 , 2018 .

4

5

9

10

M. R. Molla and Murshada Begum : Existence and Uniqueness of positive solution of the injection of the fluid into the boundary layer, Jahangirnagar Journal of Mathematics and Mathematical Sciences , vol.27 , pp.103-114 , 2012 .

11

M. R. Molla, M. K. Jaman and Mahmud-Ul-Hasan : Comparison of positive solutions for two boundary value problems arising in the boundary layer flow, Journal of Science, University of Dhaka , vol.59 , no.2 , pp.167-172 , 2011 .
